dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 3168 IH: Safe Bridges Investment Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Sean Patrick Maloney of New York (for himself and Mr. Zeldin) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to include bridges on the National Highway Performance Program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Safe Bridges Investment Act of 2015.
Section 119(d)(2) of title 23, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: Construction, reconstruction, resurfacing, restoration, rehabilitation, and preservation of, or operational improvements for, a bridge not on the National Highway System if such bridge is on the Federal-aid Highway System
